results.title: Back up, restore workload clusters using Velero - AKS enabled by Azure Arc
results.description: Back up and restore workload clusters by using Velero Applies to: AKS on Windows Server This article describes how to install and use Velero to back up and restore workload and target clusters by using Azure Blob Storage or MinIO storage in AKS on Windows Server. results.title: Minio Object Storage on Azure Local - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: Thank You| Hello @Serkan Sevincoglu, Vodafone , We have two possible approaches to set up MinIO on Azure Local: Option 1: AKS on Azure Local (AKS Hybrid) Provision AKS on Azure Local and connect it to Azure Arc for centralized policy enforcement and monitoring. However, it comes at the cost of Kubernetes ergonomics, automated lifecycle management,.
